hero.description: Hi, I'm Yadigar, a software developer in training who values clarity, precision, and continuous learning. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React                         and C#, and I enjoy turning ideas into simple and effective digital experiences.

about.p1: I come from a law background and am currently transitioning into software development, where I combine analytical thinking with technical problem-solving. My interest in programming grew from a desire to understand how digital systems are built and how logic turns into real, usable products.
about.p2: I have experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, jQuery, C, Python, PHP, and SQL. I enjoy writing clear, structured code and building applications that are practical, maintainable, and focused on real needs rather than complexity for its own sake.
about.p3: Outside of development, I focus on improving my skills through continuous learning, hands-on projects, and exploring different areas of software development to strengthen my technical foundation.
about.quote: My focus is on creating well-structured and reliable digital solutions, shaped by analytical thinking and attention to detail.

highlights.desc_1: Code that follows a logical structure, improves readability, and supports long-term maintainability.
highlights.desc_2: A structured and analytical approach to breaking down complex problems and finding practical, effective solutions.
highlights.desc_3: Thinking like a web developer by analyzing requirements, structuring logic, and building scalable, maintainable solutions.
highlights.desc_4: An organized and respectful approach to teamwork, supported by clear communication and mutual understanding.

exp.desc_1: Completed an internship teaching children coding using Unity, Scratch, JavaScript, and Python. Assisted learners with programming tasks and gained practical experience in programming education and age-appropriate instruction.
exp.desc_2: Completed a practical internship introducing the Python programming language through various programming exercises. Gained experience in 3D printing and laser cutting, combining software skills with hands-on digital fabrication techniques.
exp.desc_3: Provided legal advice and guidance on patent infringement investigations. Core competencies included strong knowledge of legislation and legal substance, leadership skills, analytical thinking, motivating and inspiring others, and demonstrating high-level initiative and creativity in challenging legal cases.
exp.company_4: 4th Civil Law Chamber of the Supreme Court, Turkey
exp.desc_4: Investigated civil law compensation cases involving physical and psychological injuries, conducted interviews, analyzed judicial data systems, and prepared recommendations for the higher court. Developed strong analytical, problem-solving, time management, and communication skills.
exp.desc_5: Served as a civil law judge handling compensation, divorce, real estate, and debt cases. Reviewed legal documents, prepared written justifications, issued decisions, and communicated rulings to involved parties, developing strong analytical, problem-solving, time management, and interpersonal skills.
exp.desc_6: Completed a judicial traineeship covering criminal and civil law, gaining broad practical experience in court operations across varied shifts, while developing strong analytical, organizational, communication, and attention-to-detail skills..
exp.company_7: Afyon Kocatepe University, Faculty of Law, Turkey
exp.desc_7: Assisted legal researchers with statistical, qualitative, and quantitative analyses, managing and visualizing research data for academic publications while developing strong research, analytical, and legislative knowledge skills.
exp.header_p: A timeline of my interdisciplinary professional journey, combining law and software development.

pro.desc_2: Katapultti is a game made with Unity, where players launch objects with a catapult in a fun and interactive environment. The project showcases game mechanics, interactivity, and responsive web deployment.
pro.desc_3: An event showcase web project with navigation menu, various holiday event sections, and front-end layout built using HTML and PHP.
